subject: Re: [junit] Placing of Source Code
msgSnippet: Hi, You can see the sorce code for all the samples under the Junit directory, ther will be folder named Samples and tests. You can place the source code and
messageBody:
Hi,

You can see the sorce code for all the samples under
the Junit directory, ther will be folder named Samples
and tests.
You can place the source code and test case in a sinle
directory..and it will be always good to keep it
separtely.
Santhu

--- anupama <anupama@...> wrote: > hi,
>
> can we place our source code and the testcase code
> in one directory.And one more question where are the
> source codes for the samples testcases SimpleTest,
> AllTests and Vector Classes.
>
> Thanks
> Anupama
>
>
